title: Rageblade is trash tier again. For starters can we have it give the AS of it's components?
body:
Rageblade went from trash, to insane, to okay, and back to trash after the most recent rework. One of the biggest issues with it is that it inexplicably has stats vastly different from it's components. Instead of just leaving the exact same AS, AP, and AD from it's components, it LOSES all AS and gains AD and AP. If it just kept the same stats as it's components, it would have similar gold efficiency and would still be a slow item that has to ramp up to be effective. All that would happen is it would be a tiny bit better on champions who rely on AS, aka every single champion who buys rageblade. 

Honestly it needs some buffs to be viable on anyone besides Kayle, but unless/until that happens, the super weird loss of AS needs to be addressed.

Rageblade is trash? Why?
Because champions who use it are out of the meta currently?

That's the only reason why you're not seeing it more often as no current champions need that on-hit damage and effect as the usual AD itemization (and fighter itemization) gets the job done.

Kayle is in the meta and she's the only champion that builds it, and even then a lot of professional players never build it on her. Jax, Irelia, and most of the other champions who built it before it was shit are still in meta. The only champions out of meta that built rageblade are Yi and Udyr. 

It's not being used because it's absurdly expensive and the stacks take too long for it to be viable with those trash stats.
